title: Where the shen skin at?
body:
I just started to play shen, and his a good champion to play. When I went to the store to look for a skin there were only three skins. the skins were 975rp or lower. and they were not great. I mean shen should get a new skin at least it should be epic, or legendary skin I mean he doesn't have a 1350rp skin. and nasus and lux are getting new skins wtf, I mean they already have epic and legendary skins and lux got an ultimate skin. agree if shen should at least get an epic skin. {{champion:98}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
They only give skins to champs that are highly played, they explained this in an "Ask Riot" a few months back

For example, the Lux skin was given due to a large Lux player base in Asia
